entry.title: Stepanakert, Yerevan denounce ongoing blockade of Karabakh-Armenia highway

media:group.media:title: Stepanakert, Yerevan denounce ongoing blockade of Karabakh-Armenia highway
media:group.media:description:
As Azerbaijanโs blockade of the only road connecting Armenia and Karabakh stretches into a second day, officials in Stepanakert and Yerevan are denouncing the closure and demanding international intervention to resolve the issue.
As of 5 p.m. local time, the Goris-Stepanakert highway remained closed, marking more than 30 hours since a group of Azerbaijanis in civilian clothing began blocking the route.

entry.title: โChoose what you love, and the rest will followโ, Dr. Sharon Chekijian

media:group.media:title: โChoose what you love, and the rest will followโ, Dr. Sharon Chekijian
media:group.media:description:
Sharon Chekijian sits down with Lara Tcholakian to discuss the role and importance of being authentic, leading a life full of meaning and purpose, and finding a career or profession that speaks to oneโs heart. They explore together the role that Sharonโs family stories and historical narratives have had on her and the values that she inherited from her father and her ancestors. She describes her experience during her initial visits to Armenia pre-independence and after the collapse of the Soviet Union, and her experiences of having witnessed the first and the second Artsakh Wars. Finally, Sharon shares her experience not just as a doctor or professor, but also as a Fulbright Scholar working and researching emergency care and disaster preparedness in Armenia.
About Sharon Chekijian, MD, MPH Dr. Sharon Chekijian is an Associate Professor at the Yale School of Medicine in the Department of Emergency Medicine. She is an expert in emergency medical systems development and patient experience. She recently received a Fulbright U.S. Scholar Award to strengthen emergency care in Armenia in cooperation with the National Institutes of Health of Armenia and the Turpanjian School of Public Health at the American University of Armenia. She is the granddaughter of Armenian Genocide survivors and, as such, is deeply committed to humanism in medicine. Dr. Chekijian co-produced a film that addresses human rights as it relates to the erasure of Armenian cultural inheritance entitled โThe Hidden Mapโ. Dr. Chekijian is an avid writer and is a fellow of the Oped Project (www.thopedproject.org).
Program overview In a new open setting, Lara deconstructs inherited cultural and historical narratives, memories, life lessons and experiences from change catalysts. Her guests reflect on the stories, people, events and mindsets that have shaped their professional and personal lives, enabling them to create a more mindful life.

entry.title: Tigran Grigoryan: Azerbaijanโs blockade of Armenia-Karabakh road threatens humanitarian catastrophe

media:group.media:title: Tigran Grigoryan: Azerbaijanโs blockade of Armenia-Karabakh road threatens humanitarian catastrophe
media:group.media:description:
Political analyst Tigran Grigoryan sat down with CivilNetโs Mark Dovich to talk about yesterdayโs blockade of the only road connecting Armenia and Karabakh, what it means for the Russian peacekeepersโ future in the region, and how it fits into the broader picture of ongoing peace talks.
As of 1 p.m. local time, the Goris-Stepanakert highway remains closed. Please follow CivilNet on Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube for updates as they come in.

media:group.media:title: ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีธึีธีทีธึีด ีฏีกีตีกึีถีซ, ีฅีฉีฅ ีนีพีฅึีกึีพีซ ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีทึีปีกึีกีฏีธึีดีจ. ีีซีฌีฅีถ ิณีกีขึีซีฅีฌีตีกีถ
media:group.media:description:
ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีถ ีซึีกีฏีกีถีกึีถีธึีด ีง ีกีฐีกีขีฅีฏีนีกีฏีกีถ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถี 120 000 ีดีกึีคีธึ ิฑึึีกีญีธึีด ึีกีฝีฟีกึีซ ีทึีปีกึีกีฏีดีกีถ ีดีฅีป ีบีกีฐีฅีฌีธีพ: ิตีฉีฅ ีกีตีฝ ึีกีฒีกึีกีฏีกีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีทีกึีธึีถีกีฏีพีซ, ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีธึีธีทีธึีด ีฏีกีตีกึีถีซ ึ ีฃีถีก ึีกีตีฌีฅึีซ: ิฑีตีฝ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ีกีฝีธึีด ีง ิฑิบ ยซีีกีฒีกึีกึีซีกีฏีกีถ ีบีกีตีดีกีถีกีฃีซึยป ีญีดีขีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีบีกีฟีฃีกีดีกีพีธึ ีีซีฌีฅีถ ิณีกีขึีซีฅีฌีตีกีถีจ ีีซีพีซีฌีีฅีฉีซ ิฑึีทีกีฌีธึีตีฝ ีีฒีคีฅีฝีตีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฆึีธึีตึีธึีด: ีีฟีฅีฒีฎีพีกีฎ ีซึีกีพีซีณีกีฏีธึีด ีกีผีกีปีซีถ ีฐีฅึีฉีซีถ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีฃีธึีฎีฅีถ ีิด ีญีกีฒีกีฒีกีบีกีฐีถีฅึีจ, ึีกีถีซ ีธึ ิผีกีนีซีถีซ ีดีซีปีกีถึึีซ ีกีถีญีกึีกีถ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีถึีซ ีกีบีกีฐีธีพีธึีดีจ ีถึีกีถึ ีธึีฒีซีฒ ีบีกึีฟีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ีง` ีฐีกีดีกีฑีกีตีถีฅึีพีกีฎ 2020-ีซ ีถีธีตีฅีดีขีฅึีซ 9-ีซ ีฐีกีตีฟีกึีกึีธึีฉีตีกีดีข:
0:00 - ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีจ 120 000 ีดีกึีคีธึ ีพีฅึึึีฅีฌ ีง ีบีกีฟีกีถีค 2:30 - ิฑีตีฝ ีบีกีฐีซีถ ีกีผีกีปีถีกีตีซีถ ีบีกีฐีกีถีปีจ ีญีกีฒีกีฒีกีบีกีฐีถีฅึีซึ ีง 4:28 - ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีฏีฃีถีกี ีฏีฟึีธึีฏ ีฃีธึีฎีธีฒีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ 7:16 - ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีถ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึีถีฅึีซ ีฏีฅีฒีฎ ีคีกีทีฟ ีง ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีธึีด 11:50 - ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีถ ิฑึึีกีญีซ ีกีถีพีฟีกีถีฃีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฅึีกีทีญีกีพีธีึ ีง 13:25 - ิฑีคึีขีฅีปีกีถีซ ีฐีฅีฟ ีฝีบีกีฝีพีธีฒ ีขีกีถีกีฏึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีดีกีฝีซีถ 15:06 - ิปีถีนีธีึ ีง ิตี-ีถ ีคีกีคีกึีฅึีถีธึีด ีดีธีถีซีฟีธึีซีถีฃีกีตีซีถ ีกีผีกึีฅีฌีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ 18:10 - ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีจ ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีบีกีฟึีกีฝีฟ ีฌีซีถีซ ีฟีธีฟีกีฌ ีบีกีทีฟีบีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ 21:41 - ิฒีกีถีกีฏีซ ีฉีพีกีฏีกีฆีดีซ ึ ีฎีกีผีกีตีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีชีกีดีฏีฅีฟีซ ีฏึีณีกีฟีดีกีถ ีดีกีฝีซีถ
